channel.title: VIZ Media on CoNime
channel.description: Recent content in VIZ Media on CoNime

item.title: Chainsaw Man Volume 18 Releases on VIZ, Denji and Nayuta Face Threat from Chainsaw Man Church
item.description: VIZ Media officially releases the 18th volume of Chainsaw Man, featuring a new conflict between Denji, Nayuta, and the fanatic Chainsaw Man Church trying to control the world.

item.title: Dr. Stone Volume 27 Released on VIZ, Senku and Team Begin Building a Time Machine
item.description: VIZ Media officially releases Dr. Stone Volume 27, introducing a new science adventure arc as Senku and his team attempt to build a time machine after receiving a mysterious message from the future.

item.title: Kaiju No. 8 Volume 13 Released on VIZ, Kafka Faces a New Threat
item.description: VIZ Media officially releases Kaiju No. 8 Volume 13, delivering intense action as Kafka faces a new threat from Kaiju No. 9 in Tachikawa City.

item.title: The Bugle Call: Song of War Volume 1 Released by VIZ, A Tale of War, Music, and a Bugler's Fate
item.description: VIZ Media has officially released The Bugle Call: Song of War Volume 1, a fantasy manga by Mozuku Sora and Higoro Toumori that blends music, strategy, and supernatural powers.
